title: 【跑酷】PARKOUR-ALOT|很多跑酷|1.12|SIMPLYDAN
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:19 编辑 





简介 INFOThis map requires Minecraft 1.12 - Snapshot 17w06aYou will need to enable snapshots in the Minecraft Launcher to select this version.It will NOT work in older client versions.
Welcome everybody to PARKOUR-ALOT! with da same name, gosh... This map promises 5 unique and catchy levels, very accurate buildings, and it's NOT so HARD.It's a medium-easy parkour, and if you have problems with finishing a level there's always a skip button even tho those are very well hidden.SimplyDan - Map CreatorKosmos2007 - Tester

-此地图需要minecraft的1.12版本-快照17w06a
-你需要在正版启动器勾选允许快照来获取此版本，站内下载：Minecraft 17w06a 发布
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-672393-1-1.html
-此地图不可以再老版本中使用
欢迎所有人来到很多跑酷！我承诺此地图有5个唯一且很难的关卡，很精准的建筑，这不难
这是一个中等偏下难度的跑酷，如果你很难完成，每一个都会有一个跳过按钮，但这些按钮一般很隐蔽。
-地图制作者：SimplyDan
-测试者：Kosmos2007
